headline: Adobe (ADBE) Stock Downgraded at Morgan Stanley on Slower AI Monetization
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight This Week. It holds a price target of $450.00 (from $520.00) on the stock. Analysts at Morgan Stanley stated that they had previously been […]

headline: 1 S&P 500 Stock to Own for Decades and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
